title: LotusBlossom
extract: This sense of purity arises from the flower's growing habit of rooting in mud and pushing up through the water to bloom. The flower's meaning in Buddhism is similar, but still unique again from the other meanings. The Buddhist Lotus represents: Patience. Purity.May 24, 2018
extract_html: This sense of purity arises from the flower's growing habit of rooting in mud and pushing up through the water to bloom. The flower's meaning in Buddhism is similar, but still unique again from the other meanings. The Buddhist Lotus represents: Patience. Purity.May 24, 2018
